oai_dc:dc.dc:title: IDEXX Bovine Pregnancy Test: A New Tool for Accurate and Early Pregnancy Diagnosis in Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Velek, Katherine
Michaud, Shona
Hart, Meghan
Leathers, Valerie
Egli, Christoph
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pregnancy
dairy cattle
reproductive management
open cows
milk production
IDEXX
ELISA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Accurate and timely detection of pregnancy in dairy cows is an essential component of todayâ€™s reproductive management programs. Veterinarians and farmers use early detection of non-pregnant (open) cows to enable faster rebreeding and shorten the calving interval, thereby maximizing milk production and revenue for the farm. IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. has developed an ELISA for the accurate detection of pregnancy as early as 28 days post breeding, providing veterinarians and dairy farmers with another tool for the early identification of open cows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2011; 144
